**What kind of data?**

The data should only be numeric/numeric factors. Columns containing text data will be filtered out.

**Format**

The file should be a .csv or .tsv text file (not Excel). In the data table there must be a first column named 'ID', which are presumed case IDs. If there is no ID column, the upload will not proceed.

**Data confidentiality**

Note that this DOES NOT automatically save your data within our server. To officially contribute your data, go to (OFFICIAL PROCESS TBD)
